subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Duncan Keith had two goals and two assists and Chicago stayed alive in its Stanley Cup title defense, routing Vancouver, 5-0, to cut the Canucks’ series lead to 3-2.
snippet: Defenseman Duncan Keith had two goals and two assists and Chicago stayed alive in its Stanley Cup title defense, routing Vancouver, 5-0, to cut the Canucks’ series lead to 3-2.
